# Wetland_Summary
This repository generates figures for Skeena East ESI wetland state of the value executive summary. 

### Usage

There are a series core scripts that are required for the analysis, they can be sourced from the Run_ESI.R script, the scripts run include:

- 01_load.R
- Wet_02_clean.R
- Wshd_02_clean.R
- 03_analysis_barchars.R
- 03_analysis_BoxPlots.R
- 03_analysis_boxplotsWshd.R
- 03_analysis_boxplotsWet.R
- 03_analysis_BoxWet.R
- 03_analysis_BoxWshd.R
- 04_output.R

### Data

Data on wetlands was collated by Jesse Fraser using provincial and
regional inventory. Skeena-Stikine FLNRORD District office supplied an
updated roads layer - available upon request.

### Project Status

This project is part of Skeena East ESI a collaboration of Skeena First
Nations and the Provincial Government.
